title: Lemoni Pizza and Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Neighborhood restaurant with causal vibe and free Wi-Fi, sits a couple doors down from its sister cafe. In spring 2014 it introduced a menu that includes more vegetarian, gluten-free, and vegan choices. Sample vegan dishes such as tofu caprese, meatless meatballs in pasta, and vegan pizzas.
